metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20861 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Spring Framework versions 6.0.0 - 6.0.6, 5.3.0 - 5.3.25, 5.2.0.RELEASE - 5.2.22.RELEASE, and older unsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide a specially crafted SpEL expression that may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
